name: Flappy COVID
description:
It is 2020, World is plagued by COVID. Play as COVID and try to evade as many vaccines as possible. Project based on the idea of Flappy Bird.

Please note that covid is a serious disease and this game is not to be taken seriously apart from the statements that are made to help promote the disease preventing actions (such as: Wash your hands, Wear a mask and Keep your distance).
